data.title: Family Friendly Fast Pizza
data.text: The pizza is pretty good, they have a few combo pizza choices to pick from that are pretty good. I would like more cheese.  I think the prices for these personal pizzas are pretty good. The bigger size is the best deal. The best deal on the menu are the kids meals. They get a 7" pizza, a drink, and applesauce all for $3.50. The pizzas take just a few minutes so also great when on the go, and for getting kids quickly satisfied.

data.title: good meal
data.text: At the end of a long day excellent way to put a nice meal on the table look for coupons in the papers for buy one get one free.  Sweet deal

data.title: Great place to take grandkids
data.text: Whenever grandkids come to visit we go to Solos, the service is always good everyone gets exactly what they want and the 7" pizza is perfect size.  The kiddos never leave hungry and bigger size is available if needed.  You can choose traditional or white sauce and build your pizza so you get everything you want.

data.title: No Mayo!
data.text: Good little restaurant specializing in custom pizzas. Family size to personal size on every one. I had the beef au jou panini. Was very tasty but they don't have mayo!  What a disappointment!  And the ice machine was out of order so I was forced to drink a bottled soda. Fresh iced tea is my preference. Atmosphere was typical fast food environment.

data.title: Great Pizza. Made in front of you to order or select one of there excellent combinations.
data.text: We go here at least twice a month if not more!  Kids eat free on the weekends.  Free Ice Cream.  And everyone gets what they want on their own pizza!  Gluten Free if you need, also have 500 Calorie Pizzas!  Fast too!

data.title: Good pizza
data.text:
We love their pizza. Cooked to order in less than 10 minutes with fresh quality ingredients.
They need to do some work on cleaning the place up though.

data.title: Good individual pizza, but they can be a bit expensive...
data.text: I love this place but it is probably someplace you want to go without the family.    Your buying individual pizza's so with more then one mouth to feed it can get expensive quickly.

data.title: Great Pizza
data.text: While there are many many pizza places around, Solo Pizza is a unique experience with very tasty pizza.  It is very casual and relaxing.  The location is also great and easy to access.

data.title: Solos Pizza is the Best
data.text: This is a very family friendly pizza place where the kids can get their own pizza. Another great reason to visit on the weekends is that kids eat free with paying adults. That they have gluten free options for those with allergies.  Fresh ingreadients in their pizzas and salads. Free Icecream if you dine in!

data.title: Pizza Your Way
data.text: I like that I get individual pizza and I tell them exactly what I want on my pizza.  Pizzas are fresh and service is fast. You can't go wrong because you can create your own and you can watch them make it and bake it before your eyes.

data.title: Fresh Ingredients!
data.text: Our first visit and we'll be going back. We each had a pizza and salad. Ingredients for both were very fresh. The food tasted great. Staff was very helpful. Great place for everyone to get the pizza they want. Maple Grove location was very clean. Pizzas, salads, and sandwiches all the food looked very good as it was served to various tables.

data.title: Fantastic pizza! Nice people!!
data.text: Solos pizzeria is fantastic! They have the best pizza in the state of Minnesota. I have tried the rest folks- trust me- this where you get fantastic pizza! The people are all so friendly too.

data.title: Consistently good!
data.text: Always have a good pizza here and excellent service. A little busy at lunchtime and the wait in line is a little long, but worth it.

data.title: Best pizza in town!!!
data.text: Ok- check it out. This place has the best pizza in Maple Grove. Courteous staff- fast lunch pizzas that are the bomb! Plus, free ice cream after lunch!? Priceless! Keep up the good work Solos!

data.title: Yum
data.text: A nice variety of flavors and toppings.  We love the bread that comes with the salads.  We often order enough for leftovers.

data.title: Great individual gourmet pizza
data.text: There are 3 gourmet pizza places in Maple Grove. 2 are really really good and one is not so.  This is one of the really really good ones.

data.title: Solos Quick and Very Good
data.text: I stopped at Solos for dinner on a business trip.  The menu is pretty standard for a pizza place but the fresh ingredient were the highlight.  I had a 7" individual with "Big Tony" toppings which included fresh basil, oregano and tomatoes.  I rate the pizza a very good only because I have had better crust not that it was bad, just not excellent.  You order at the counter, seat yourself and they deliver to your table.  No beer or wine available so that might be a negative for some folks.  Overall very good place to stop for quick pizza dinner that won't disappoint.

data.title: Fresh Ingredients! Kid friendly! Best Pizza!
data.text: We come here each Tuesday after my son's gymnastics. My son can feel good about eating here with his food allergies since all the ingredients are fresh, and prepared on site. The service is always most excellent and the atmosphere kid friendly. They always welcome us with a smile, and the food never disappoints. The pizza is ready in a few minutes and the salads are really good. Love Solos!

data.title: Yum!
data.text: Delicious pizza!  Love that everyone can order exactly what they want.  The ingredients were fresh, the sauce was tasty, the spices were perfect & the crust was buttery deliciousness. Yum!

data.title: Better Than I Thought
data.text: I was a lttle hesitant to try this place since I am married to an Itialian that makes great pizza but I am glad I did.The selection of toppings was good and they even had low calorie options. THis being said I would still rather have my wife's pizza but this will work when I am in town. I will be back.The service was fast and friendly.
